content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting System around (-45, -80)
Complex smelting setup consisting of:
- Two furnaces at (45.0, -80.0) and (47.0, -80.0), both fueled with coal
- Input inserters:
  - Burner inserter at (44.5, -82.5) picking up from (44.5, -83.5) and dropping at (44.5, -81.5)
  - Burner inserter at (46.5, -82.5) picking up from (46.5, -83.5) and dropping at (46.5, -81.5)
- Output inserters:
  - Burner inserter at (44.5, -81.5) picking up from (44.5, -80.5) and dropping at (44.5, -82.5)
  - Burner inserter at (46.5, -81.5) picking up from (46.5, -80.5) and dropping at (46.5, -82.5)
- Belt system with some coal and iron ore being transported

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collision Errors
- Before placing entities, check if the target location is free from other entities
- When placing inserters near belts and furnaces, ensure proper spacing and alignment
- Consider removing interfering entities before placing new ones
- Pay attention to the exact positioning coordinates - even small decimal differences can cause collisions

### System Design Tips
- Plan the complete layout including input/output paths before placing entities
- Leave adequate space between components for inserters and belts
- Consider the working radius of inserters when positioning them relative to furnaces and belts

NAMESPACE

### Functions
No explicit functions defined in the provided logs

### Important Variables
- output_inserter1: EntityReference (burner-inserter)
- output_inserter2: EntityReference (burner-inserter)

### System State Variables
- Inventory contains:
  - wooden-chest: 4
  - transport-belt: 28
  - burner-inserter: 4
  - coal: 3297
  - iron-ore: 49
  - iron-plate: 503
